aka: 嗜血法医：动画网络短剧

cast.name: 詹妮弗·卡朋特 Jennifer Carpenter
迈克尔·C·豪尔 Michael C. Hall

trans_title: 嗜血法医：动画网络短剧 第一季
嗜血法医：动画网络短剧
introduction: 《双面法医 Dexter:Early Cuts》动画网络剧总共12集，将于北京时间10月26日在SHO电视台的网站上播出，刚动画系列将讲述Dexter年轻的时候是如何一步步成为现在的“连环杀手”的。Showtime Announced That It Is Producing A 12-Part Webisode Animated Prequel To Dexter Named "Early Cuts". Michael C. Hall Will Reprise His Role As The Voice Of Dexter.The Current Storyline In This Series Involves Dexter Hunting A Former Marine Sniper. This Is Presumably The Same Individual Dexter Recalls In The Season 1 Episode "Return To Sender"."Dexter: Early Cuts", A New Exclusive Showtime Webisode Series, Will Help Build Dexter’s Early Mythology And Detail His Early Days As A Serial Killer. The Twelve Part Series Will Be Told In One To Two Minute Chapters.
chinese_title: 嗜血法医：动画网络短剧 第一季
